com.indeed.vw.wrapper.progvalidation

Class Metrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.indeed.vw.wrapper.progvalidation.Metrics

  • public class Metrics
extends Object
    Class that wraps multiple metrics and prints their scores every n examples.
